resources.string: In a game of baseball, if you get 3 strikes then your out.
The strike zone is always the same size for every umpire.
If the ball is hit down the line and goes into foul territory after it has passed 1st or 3rd base, the play is dead and the batter goes back to the plate.
If the pitcher bocks while there is someone on base, the base-runner advances to the next base for free.
42 is a special number in baseball.
